name: Dungeon of the Dead (Benji11)
description:
A simple 2D plat-former game submitted to WGJ 87 with the theme "Infinite Hallway" 

Controls:
Arrow Keys to move
E key is to attack
Q is to roll
Spacebar is to jump

Try rolling under spikes!
If you slash your sword downwards onto spikes you'll spring back up!
Knight statues will act as checkpoints!

Programming - Benji (me)

Art - SomeFarang

Music - PaulDubreuil
